name: pr-workflow-test
description: a set of workflows to cater to Teammates' CI needs

scripts.actions:minify: ncc build .github/pr_management/pr_marked_draft/main.ts -o .github/pr_management/pr_marked_draft/ -m --license licenses.txt && ncc build .github/pr_management/pr_marked_ready_for_review/main.ts -o .github/pr_management/pr_marked_ready_for_review/ -m --license licenses.txt && ncc build .github/pr_management/ready_for_review_comment/main.ts -o .github/pr_management/ready_for_review_comment/ -m --license licenses.txt
scripts.actions:build: npm run-script actions:tsc && npm run-script actions:minify
